p:
Although predicted R
0 ( T) correlated with the observed occurrence and magnitude of human incidence for all three viruses, these observed incidence metrics were higher for DENV than for CHIKV and ZIKV. While the reason for this difference is unclear, the most likely explanation is that DENV is much more established in the Americas, so it is more likely to be detected, diagnosed, and reported. Because ZIKV and CHIKV are newly emerging, they may not have fully saturated the region at this early stage.
